main event: A report from Project Blue Book concluded that an observation of unidentified objects in Charleston, W. Va. was a hoax.
interesting points: The hoax was confirmed through follow-up investigation,The estimated duration of observation was minutes,Initial report indicated unusual circumstances surrounding the sighting,Attempts to gather further information from the observers were made,No photographs were obtained during the investigation.
witness description: The investigation found no credible witnesses due to the hoax conclusion.
